snippet.title: Him & Her Collection - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW!

Him & Her Collection brings three games of the challenging puzzle-platformer series, Him & Her, Her Challenges and Him & Her 3. The player must find a way to their significant other by defying gravity between levels.

You can move your character from a side-scrolling perspective, and at any time, you can also jump. However, when not jumping you simply walk towards the platforms and the entire level will rotate according to the direction you are moving the ledges. 

It might seem a little complex at first, but it's actually a simple concept that you learn in a very straightforward way. Instead of “falling” into endless pits, what happens is that the entire level (and gravity) will change.

Published by QUByte Interactive and developed by Game Nacional.

#ps5games #ps4games
